ranking.name: Sora 2
ranking.description: Synchronized generation of audio, sound effects, and dialogue with video. Cameo feature allows inserting people into any scene
ranking.description_ja: 音声・効果音・セリフを映像と同期生成。Cameo機能で人物を任意のシーンに挿入可能

ranking.name: Runway Gen-3
ranking.description: Paint-specify motion with Motion Brush. Act-One feature generates high-quality animation from live-action
ranking.description_ja: Motion Brushで動きをペイント指定。Act-One機能で実写から高品質アニメーション生成

ranking.name: Pika
ranking.description: Pikaframes feature specifies start/end frames and auto-generates in-between. Supports 10-second 1080p
ranking.description_ja: Pikaframes機能で開始・終了フレームを指定し中間を自動生成。10秒1080p対応

ranking.name: Stable Video Diffusion
ranking.description: Open-source and commercially available. Attractive customizability and low-cost operation
ranking.description_ja: オープンソースで商用利用可。カスタマイズ性と低コスト運用が魅力

ranking.name: Synthesia
ranking.description: Corporate training and education focused with 240+ AI avatars. Full SOC2/GDPR compliance with enterprise adoption
ranking.description_ja: 企業研修・教育特化で240種類以上のAIアバター。SOC2/GDPR完全準拠で大企業導入実績

ranking.name: HeyGen
ranking.description: Marketing video focused with unlimited generation. Strong in 300 voice types and custom avatar creation
ranking.description_ja: マーケティング動画特化で無制限生成可能。300種類の音声とカスタムアバター作成に強み

ranking.name: Luma Dream Machine
ranking.description: Ray3 engine supports 16-bit HDR output. Ultra-fast generation under 10 seconds and 4K upscaling
ranking.description_ja: Ray3エンジンで16bit HDR出力対応。10秒以内の超高速生成と4Kアップスケール

ranking.name: NVIDIA VideoLDM
ranking.description: Research-level cutting-edge technology. Pioneer in long-form video and high-resolution output
ranking.description_ja: 研究レベルの最先端技術。長時間動画と高解像度出力の先駆者

ranking.name: Descript Underlord
ranking.description: Integrated with audio editing. Text-based simultaneous video and audio editing
ranking.description_ja: 音声編集と統合。テキストベースで動画とオーディオを同時編集可能

ranking.name: InVideo AI
ranking.description: GPT-4 integration for full automation from script. Shopify/WooCommerce sync auto-updates product videos
ranking.description_ja: GPT-4連携でスクリプトから完全自動生成。Shopify/WooCommerce同期で商品動画を自動更新
